stadiums.name: Minute Maid Park
stadiums.fun_fact1: Features train tracks with a functioning train above left field.
stadiums.fun_fact2: The roof can be opened or closed in about 15 minutes.

stadiums.name: Wrigley Field
stadiums.fun_fact1: Features live ivy on the outfield fence.
stadiums.fun_fact2: Stadium lighting to play night games was not installed until 1988.
